entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:21 PM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
